name: Jade's Touhou Cosplay
description:
CONTENT NOTE: a small amount of the text in this game alludes to the social media kind of verbal abuse. it's censored, but proceed with caution.

local boy makes the best of things and learns to enjoy crossplaying

i do not approve of the way the social media commenters treat the poor boy, it is just how people behave

press right 16ish times on "Exit" on the dressup menu to go to the debug room & unlock everything if you get stuck/lost

all music/art/game code/etc made by me

contains some font graphics from twemoji by twitter, used under the MIT license: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/twitter/twemoji/master/LICENSE

download versions below
